# Acme Corp ESG Report – FY 2023

## Executive Summary
Acme Corp delivered solid ESG performance in FY 2023, meeting most EU Taxonomy requirements. Carbon intensity was 112.5 kg CO₂e per thousand dollars, board diversity reached 45% female representation, and waste recycling rate improved to 78%.

## Metric Tables
| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Carbon Intensity | 112.5 |
| Board Diversity | 45% |
| Energy Consumption | 2,389,000 MWh |
| Water Usage | 540,000 m³ |
| Waste Recycling Rate | 78% |

## Stakeholder Survey Summary
- Employee Satisfaction (Avg): 4.2/5 (1,245 responses)
- Environmental Concerns (Avg): 3.8/5 (1,198 responses)
- Governance Feedback (Avg): 4.0/5 (1,210 responses)

## Regulatory Checklist (EU Taxonomy)
- Carbon Reporting: met
- Human Rights Due Diligence: partial
- Biodiversity Impact Assessment: missing

## Regulatory Outlook
Upcoming EU regulations will require additional disclosures on biodiversity impacts and expanded human‑rights due‑diligence processes.

*(End of confidential report)*
